FROMSUN(6D)                                         FROMSUN(6D)





NAME
       fromsun - convert a sun image into an IRIS image

SYNOPSIS
       fromsun inimage.ras outimage.rgb

DESCRIPTION
       fromsun  converts  any type of SUN rasterfile image into
       an IRIS image file.

SEE ALSO
       tosun(6D)



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004               FROMSUN(6D)
